sourcesContent:
<template>
<g class="animated-subsectors" v-if="step === 4">
    <g class='substacked' v-bind:transform='translate()'>
    <g class='stacked-SubEmissions' v-if="step >=3 && step <=4" clip-path="url(#cut-off-graph)">
        <path class="subemissions" v-for="(item, i) in items" v-bind:key='i' :d='item.d' :id='item.id'/>
    </g>
    <g class="axis-step4" v-if="step == 4">
      <Axis class='xA' v-bind:scales='newScale().xAxis' v-bind:chartDefaults='chartDefaults' v-bind:data='emissions' v-bind:trns='trnsX()'/>
      <Axis class='yA' v-bind:scales='newScale().yAxis' v-bind:chartDefaults='chartDefaults' v-bind:data='emissions' v-bind:trns='trnsY'/>
    </g>
    </g>
    <Animatedcursor v-if="step == 4"/>
</g>
</template>

<script>
import * as d3 from 'd3'
import { mapState } from 'vuex'
import Axis from './axis.vue'
import Animatedcursor from './animatedcursor.vue'
import PopUpRight from './LinechartPopUp-right.vue'

import emissionsData from '../assets/emissions.json'
import sectors from '../assets/emissions-stacked.json'
import subEmissions from '../assets/subemissions.json'

export default {
  name: 'chartanimated',
  components: {
    Axis,
    Animatedcursor,
    PopUpRight
  },
  data () {
    return {
      emissions: emissionsData,
      sectors: sectors,
      subemissions: subEmissions,
      chartDefaults: {
        width: 1000,
        height: 400,
        chartId: 'linechart-vue',
        title: 'Emissions',
        margin: {
          top: 5,
          right: 50,
          bottom: 25,
          left: 0
        },
        data: []
      },
      line: '',
      translate: this.getTranslation,
      translateLine: 'translate(0,0)',
      trnsY: 'translate(0,0)',
      trnsX: this.getTrnsx,
      toggleClass: true,
      chartWidth: this.getWidth
    }
  },
  methods: {
    newScale () {
      var parseDate = d3.timeParse('%Y')
      this.emissions.forEach(function (d) {
        d.date = parseDate(d.Year)
      })
      var x = d3
        .scaleTime()
        .domain([d3.min(this.emissions, d => d.date), d3.max(this.emissions, d => d.date)])
        .rangeRound([0, this.chartDefaults.width])

      var y = d3
        .scaleLinear()
        .domain([0, 40000000])
        .range([this.chartDefaults.height, -100])

      d3.axisBottom().scale(x)
      d3.axisLeft().scale(y)

      var xAxis = d3
        .axisBottom()
        .scale(x)
        .tickSize(0)
        .tickFormat(d3.timeFormat('%Y'))
        .ticks(d3.timeYear.every(5))

      var yAxis = d3
        .axisRight()
        .scale(y)
        .tickValues([10000000, 20000000, 30000000, 40000000])
        .tickSize(830)
        .tickPadding(6)

      return {
        x,
        y,
        xAxis,
        yAxis
      }
    },
    // this set of functions are transforming the scale of the graph from step 3 and 4
    getTrnsx (chartDefaults) {
      const t = 'translate(0,' + this.chartDefaults.height + ')'
      return t
    },
    getTranslation (chartDefaults) {
      var tr = 'translate(' + 100 + ',' + 200 + ')'
      if (this.step === 4) {
        tr = 'translate(' + -30 + ',' + 280 + ')'
      }
      return tr
    },
    getWidth (chartDefaults) {
      var width = '90%'
      if (this.step === 4) {
        width = '100%'
      }
      return width
    }
  },
  // this computed property needs to be added for the scrollytelling to function
  computed: {
    ...mapState({
      step: state => state.scrollytelling ? state.scrollytelling.step : null
    }),
// this function return an array with paths for the stacked barchart
    items () {
      const areas = ['Aviation', 'Road', 'Other', 'Shipping', 'Combustion', 'Production', 'Solvents', 'OtherProc', 'IndWaste', 'CommRes', 'Agriculture', 'Public', 'Autoproduced']

      const scale = this.newScale()

      const parseDate = d3.timeParse('%Y')
      const data = this.subemissions

      data.forEach(function (d) {
        d.date = parseDate(d.Year)
      })

      var areaFixed = d3
        .area()
        .x(d => { return scale.x(d.date) })
        .curve(d3.curveCatmullRom)

      const newAreas = areas.map(function (item, i) {
        areaFixed
          .y0(d => {
            let sum = 0
            for (let n = 0; n < i; n++) {
              sum = sum + d[areas[n]]
            }
            return scale.y(sum)
          })
          .y1(d => {
            let sum = 0
            for (let n = 0; n <= i; n++) {
              sum = sum + d[areas[n]]
            }
            return scale.y(sum)
          })
        return {
          d: areaFixed(data),
          id: areas[i]
        }
      })

      return newAreas
    }
  }
}
</script>

<!-- Add "scoped" attribute to limit CSS to this component only -->
<style scoped lang="scss">
// @import "library/src/style/base.scss";
@import "library/src/style/variables.scss";

svg {
  position:absolute;
}

.subemissions {
  stroke-width: 0.5;
}
.subemissions:hover {
  fill: $color-blue;
}

#Combustion, #Production, #Solvents, #OtherProc, #IndWaste {
  fill: darken($color-yellow, 30%);
  stroke: darken( $color-violet, 30% );

}

#CommRes, #Agriculture {
  fill: darken( $color-yellow, 20% );
  stroke: darken( $color-violet, 20% );

}

#Aviation, #Road, #Other, #Shipping {
  fill: darken( $color-yellow, 40% );
  stroke: darken( $color-violet, 40% );

}

#Public, #Autoproduced {
  fill: darken( $color-yellow, 5% );
  stroke: darken( $color-violet, 5% );
}

</style>
